Vietnamese Women in Computer Science

A collection of Vietnamese women who are currently working in the field of Computer Science.

Hi there!
Whether you're a junior student looking for inspiration... üéì
Or a senior researcher seeking collaboration opportunities... ü§ù
I hope this page can be a reference for you (or for any Vietnamese woman) who wants to pursue a career in Computer Science.
Good luck!
